title: WELCOME TO THE AGE OF CONVERSATIONAL INTERFACES!
body: In the age of conversational interfaces, users are increasingly expecting to interact with applications in a flexible and contextualised way. They also expect to interact with the app via multiple communication channels such as SMS, voice and lately bots. In this talk, we will go through programmable and contextual communications, why itâ€™s a key element of apps development in the present and future? We will also learn how to add feature rich communications capabilities to your apps using Microsoft Bot Framework and Nexmo SMS and Voice APIs.
speaker: Rabeb Othmani
